snippet: Doodnauth Shivmangal, the owner and trainer of the horse Guyana Star Dweej, has managed to stir some excitement in an immigrant community ahead of the Belmont Stakes.
abstract: Horse trainer and owner of the horse Guyana Star Dweej, Doodnauth Shivmangal stirs up some excitement in an immigrant community ahead of the Belmont Stakes; Shivmangal, who immigrated from Guyana in 1984, insists his long-shot horse has a real shot in the Belmont Stakes.
lead_paragraph: Doodnauth Shivmangal, the owner and trainer of the horse Guyana Star Dweej, has managed to stir some excitement in an immigrant community ahead of the Belmont Stakes.

headline.seo: Guyana Star Dweej Is a Long-Shot in the Belmont Stakes
headline.main: Behind Belmont Long Shot, a Quirky and Bold Trainer
headline.print_headline: Behind a Belmont Long Shot: A Bold, Quirky Owner
